list_definition.definition: (abbreviated to loglog) mathematics the number of times eg 10 must be multiplied by itself to produce a particular number

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: 10  10  10 or 103 = 1,000, so 3 is here the logarithm of 1,000.
